title: PSA: Don’t forget to celebrate International Dance Day with today’s Apple Watch Activity Challenge
content:
Today is International Dance Day, and Fitness+ has a new Apple Watch Activity Challenge for you. After spending 20 minutes or more dancing, you can earn exclusive awards to share with friends and family. 

more…

The post PSA: Don’t forget to celebrate International Dance Day with today’s Apple Watch Activity Challenge appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After 20 minutes of dancing, you can earn an exclusive International Dance Day award to share with friends and family in the Fitness+ app.
